comment: 由 github 用户 @r1cHk1d 建议的翻译修改

Stretch Time.comment: 与著名的《回到未来》相对应

Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an h.comment: 投机倒把的负面效果，补充一个小字。目前只有该处使用这个文本。希望以后不会有其他文本重复利用该字符串。
Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an h.english: Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an hour.
Upgrades are %1% more expensive for an h.chinese: 1 小时内升级价格上升 %1%。<q>这是什么咒语？我简直赚麻了！</q>

Summon Crafty Pixies.comment: 钩心斗角有建筑精美的意思（减少花费），也有明争暗斗的意思（狡猾的精灵），一语双关

Find the <b>forgotten madeleine</b>..chinese: 找到被遗忘的奶油茶糕。

[Elderwort quote]A very old, long-forgot.english: A very old, long-forgotten subspecies of edelweiss that emits a strange, heady scent. There is some anecdotal evidence that these do not undergo molecular aging.
[Elderwort quote]A very old, long-forgot.chinese: 这是火绒草长期被遗忘的一个古老亚种，会散发出令人陶醉的奇特芳香。轶事证据表明这种植物不会经历分子老化。

Spells backfire %1 times less for %2..chinese: 法术走火入魔的几率低 %1 倍，持续 %2。

Spells backfire %1 times more for %2..chinese: 法术走火入魔的几率高 %1 倍，持续 %2。

Summon a random golden cookie. Each exis.english: Summon a random golden cookie. Each existing golden cookie makes this spell +%1% more likely to backfire.
Summon a random golden cookie. Each exis.chinese: 召唤一个随机的黄金饼干。每一个现有的黄金饼干都会使这个魔法走火入魔的几率 +%1%。

Cast a random spell at half the magic co.english: Cast a random spell at half the magic cost, with twice the chance of backfiring.
Cast a random spell at half the magic co.chinese: 随机施放一个魔法，魔法费用减半，但是施放的魔法有两倍的几率走火入魔。

Spells backfire %1 times less for the ne.english: Spells backfire %1 times less for the next %2 minutes.
Spells backfire %1 times less for the ne.chinese: 在接下来的 %2 分钟内，咒语走火入魔的几率减少 %1 倍。

Spells backfire %1 times more for the ne.english: Spells backfire %1 times more for the next %2 minutes.
Spells backfire %1 times more for the ne.chinese: 在接下来的 %2 分钟内，咒语走火入魔的几率增加 %1 倍。
